ModSettingDef.label: Zhul Audio Volume
ModSettingDef.description: Adjust the volume of all Zhul tribal sounds (chants, drums, war cries)

ModSettingDef.label: Zhul Raid Frequency
ModSettingDef.description: How often the Zhul tribe launches raids (Default: Normal, High: More raids, Low: Fewer raids)

ModSettingDef.label: Cannibal Mood Bonus
ModSettingDef.description: Mood bonus when Zhul pawns consume humanlike meat

ModSettingDef.label: Moustache Ritual Frequency
ModSettingDef.description: How often Zhul pawns perform daily moustache grooming rituals

ModSettingDef.label: Enable Terror Effects
ModSettingDef.description: When enabled, colonists will have fear reactions to Zhul bone drumming

ModSettingDef.label: Recruitment Difficulty
ModSettingDef.description: How difficult it is to recruit captured Zhul raiders

ModSettingDef.label: Audio Trigger Distance
ModSettingDef.description: Distance at which Zhul tribal sounds can be heard (in tiles)
